snippet: In its 12th season the Tribeca Film Festival, which begins Wednesday and includes the premieres of 53 features, has woven itself into the fabric of the New York cultural schedule.
abstract: Stephen Holden describes highlights from this year's Tribeca Film Festival, which includes the premieres of 53 features; notes that festival, now in its 12th year, has become more artistically discriminating and has snugly woven itself into fabric of New York's cultural schedule.
lead_paragraph: In its 12th season the Tribeca Film Festival, which begins Wednesday and includes the premieres of 53 features, has woven itself into the fabric of the New York cultural schedule.

headline.main: A Festival Now Comfortable in Its Skin
headline.print_headline: A Festival Now Comfortable in Its Skin
